TOCA Race Driver 3 is the ultimate racing simulator for the Mac. You get every element of motorsport, with over 35 types of racing through 120 championships! TOCA Race Driver 3 features the most motorsports in any game, including Open-Wheel, GT, Touring Car, Oval, Off-Road and Classics.

Features:

* Over 70 licensed race cars.
* Over 80 international circuits from around the world.
* Most realistic damage in any Mac racing game.
* Pro Career Mode: Choose from one of six racing disciplines and drive your way up to the ultimate racing machine.
* World Tour Mode: Takes you on an exhilarating tour through the game and lets you sample all the different racing styles on offer.
* Up to 21 cars on track in ultra-close pack driving (against aggressive AI drivers).
* 12 online players! Take on the world with Practice, Qualifying, Elimination, Race and Championship modes.
* True Mechanical Effects! Blown engines, burst tires, overheating radiators and moreÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¶
